import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getInfluencer } from '../action/influencerActions'; import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from "swiper/react"; import "swiper/css"; import './influence.css' const Influence = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {influencerList} = useSelector((state)=>state.influencer); useEffect(()=> { dispatch(getInfluencer()) },[dispatch]); return (
